title: yvxlc2f
author: yvxlc2f
content: 🎁Welcome to our store, where gift cards with a receipt of high quality are sold and are absolutely legal and safe to use at a price of 50% of the nominal value, the goods are issued instantly by email, this is the perfect gift for any occasion.Thanks to the gift card, you can choose and buy any product for yourself. Your dreams come true instantly.🌏List of gift cards that we have in stock:Amazon,American Express,Walmart,iTunes,Target,Starbucks,Netflix,Google Play,MasterCard,Disney,Best Buy,QVC,Sears,,Apple Store🌏List of countries where gift cards can be used:(au,br,ca,cn,mx,nl,fr,de,in,it,pl,sa,sg,es,se,tr,ae,uk,com)🇦🇺 🇧🇷 🇨🇦 🇨🇳 🇫🇷 🇩🇪 🇮🇳 🇮🇹 🇯🇵 🇲🇽 🇳🇱 🇵🇱 🇸🇦 🇸🇬 🇪🇸 🇸🇪 🇹🇷 🇦🇪 🇬🇧 🇺🇸 🎁DISCOUNT 10%🎁 Coupon - « MARKET10 »💰We accept payment:Bitcoin,Bcash,Dash,Dogecoin,Ethereum,Litecoin,Monero,Zcash,TetherUs ( USDT TRC20)🛒Buy Gift Cards Website: giftss.top🌏Telegram: @giftsstop

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Your service is highly suspicious. I would advise anyone to proceed with caution when trying to do business with you. It's barely a year old and on your Trustpilot page there is already a negative review - https://www.trustpilot.com/review/giftss.topQuoteScam dont buyScam dont buy, the other review are fakeand there is also a banner warning about thisQuoteDomain: giftss.topRegistrar: NICENIC INTERNATIONAL GROUP CO., LIMITEDRegistered On: 2023-07-03Expires On: 2024-07-03Updated On: 2023-07-05When I also search about your service, this comes up https://www.ftc.gov/news-events/data-visualizations/data-spotlight/2020/12/gift-cards-top-scammers-wish-lists

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on November 18, 2023, 09:18:56 PMQuoteScam dont buyScam dont buy, the other review are fakeand there is also a banner warning about thisWhen there's a banner note like this on trustpilot expect it's suspicious and people should stay away from it. Reasons are these are paid fake reviews. And with all of the scam gift cards all over the world, buying on such new site is suicide, always buy on those reputed site marketplace.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: there is no honest company that create fake reviews for its service, especially since you received few reviews, and these reviews, unfortunately, were negative. I will put a negative trust on this account, and it is best to avoid dealing with it, even if it uses warranty, as these cards may be stolen or hacked.

comments.author: buscopan
comments.body: Honest companies do not resort to generating fake reviews for their services. However, given the limited number of reviews received, and the unfortunate fact that they were negative, it raises concerns about the trustworthiness of their business. Sometime in August I bought disney world ticket only to arrive there and found out it was fake. This really was embarrassing for me and my kids, I advice buy direct

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: buscopan on November 22, 2023, 05:03:34 PMHonest companies do not resort to generating fake reviews for their services. However, given the limited number of reviews received, and the unfortunate fact that they were negative, it raises concerns about the trustworthiness of their business. Sometime in August I bought disney world ticket only to arrive there and found out it was fake. This really was embarrassing for me and my kids, I advice buy directNot only that, but they are scammers. This is the only review that is not 5 stars or responses that look like they are fake and yet it is about scam warning.QuoteSent payment and never received $50…Sent payment and never received $50 gift card, customer service was no help. Website didn't even keep record of my ordeThey did not try to answer it or answer it here, so it is better not to use this service.
